head.title: New Zealand holiday homes, baches and vacation homes for rent.

input.placeholder: Where do you want to go?
input.name: locationsearch

a.title: Beautifully Appointed Swiss Chalet with Mountain Views

p.a: Beautifully Appointed Swiss Chalet with Mountain Views

div.p:
Relaxing spot with mountain views & a short stroll to town. Complimentary WiFi.
Warm and inviting this quaint & beautifully appointed chalet has it all!
A Swiss cedar chalet located in the heart of the vibrant ski town of Ohakune. Timeless craftsmanship makes this cedar cottage a very special base from which to explore Mt Ruapehu and its surrounds.
Built by a Swiss carpenter, this chalet is packed full of gorgeous features which make the property truly unique. A full renovation has ensured that it is immaculately presented and your comfort maximised.
Watch the sun set across the mountain from the cozy dinning room while enjoying a home cooked meal from the fully equipped kitchen. After a day of skiing return to the warmth of the log fire and enjoy endless hot water from the infinity hot water system. Extra heaters are provided in the bedrooms. For apres ski, it's just a shor

This 1 bedroom self contained flat is available for rent. The flat sits at the back of a large and well presented section separate from the main house. Close to local schools and malls makes this an ideal home away from home. The property is offered as either furnished or unfurnished and has a small but functional kitchen and good size lounge.

Maximum number of guests is 8. If you have a bigger group than 8 you may want to book our other property A Gem of Comfort - right next door as well! - listing no 24104! - to find, enter 24104 in the keyword search)
Brand New three / four bedroom, two bathroom, one or two living areas Home! Modern decor, very clean and fresh. State of the art everything! Comfortable warm, dry and quiet.
The accommodation is located on the western side of the city and offers offers a very hard to beat combination of proximity to the city centre; southern and northern transport routes, Christchurch international airport and Canterbury and Lincoln universities.
Handy to Riccarton Race Course, Showgate events centre, Riccarton craft market (all 2 km), Antarctic centre (7km), Dressmart (3km)and Wigram airforce museum (1.5km), Denton Oval cycle track(3km), Canterbury Agricultural Park / A & P Show (3.

a.title: Raro Beach Bach - Great for Groups of up to 12 people

p.a: Raro Beach Bach - Great for Groups of up to 12 people

div.p:
Absolute beach front with expansive views over the lagoon and the distant reef with the constant sound of the surf.
The lagoon is great for snorkeling and safe for children.
Located in Vaimaanga, Rarotonga close to restaurants, cafe,video store,takeaways and a general store with fresh vegetables,petrol, beers and general supplies.
Wigmores waterfall is an easy 2 km stroll for a refreshing dip to cool off in the fresh water pool at the base of the falls.
The bus service is available right at the roadside for treks into town.
We have had many weddings, birthdays and other functions at the "bach" as the property layout can keep people together but separate enough for privacy when required.
There is sleeping arrangements for up to 14 people but we can slip a few more in if they sleep on the bed settee in the lounge or blow up mattresses.
You can "Bach it" in Rarot

This is a luxury waterfront apartment situated in an historic Art Deco building; formally known as the T@G and more recently 'The Dome'. The apartment is absolutely, centrally located within Napier's CDB. Wake up to spectacular views of the Pacific Ocean and Cape Kidnappers. Enjoy breakfast in the apartment or stroll down to the nearest cafe.
Minutes from the Masonic restaurant, the fabulous Art Deco shop and the newly built MTG (Museum, Theatre and Gallery).
Must do: 50 metres from the start of the Cycling Trails which meander through local attractions, 10 kilometres from the Farmers Market held every Sunday where you can buy local produce, 5 minutes away from the Ocean Spa complex.
SPECIAL: During the month of February, any attraction or event booked during your stay courtesy transportation will be offered to and from the venue. This applies to attraction or events within the Na

div.div: Show: All properties | Only special offers

p.span: Our modern self- contained cottage is situated in beautiful Lake Hawea village, surrounded by majestic mountains. We are just 12 kilometres from Lake Wanaka and in the centre of the Lakes District of Central Otago. We are located about 30 minutes from two major ski fields - Treble Cone and Cardrona. This new and spacious character alpine cottage is fully equipped with modern appliances (stereo,

The Shipping Room is our spacious, re-furbished one-bedroom unit on a sunny 10-acre section, just 700 metres from Kina Beach. We have a lovely aspect of the sea inlet and the Tasman and Nelson Ranges, with open views of neighbouring vines and olives. On our section are small herds of friendly alpaca and cattle. Nelson is a 40km, half-hour drive to the east and Motueka, the gateway to stunning

a.title: Eliza's Garden Cottage Luxury Boutique Vineyard Cottage.

p.span:
*Private Swimming Pool.
*Heart of the Wineries - the wine trail begins at Eliza's .....
*5 minutes drive to Blenheim, 15 minutes to Picton and the Marlborough Sounds
*Free - WI FI, full Sky TV, My Sky.
*Gourmet full country breakfast provisions.
*All the essentials you will need in the pantry and laundry
* Top of the line beds dressed in luxury white cotton and goose down
Set on a lifestyle block of mature gardens and trees and bordering the picturesque 18 hole Northland Golf Course, heading north we are 8 kms from Whangarei CBD

SPECIAL DEAL: UNLIMITED FREE WIFI. Modern one bedroom cottage in the historic goldmining region of Stafford (11kms to the North of Hokitika). A lovely peaceful spot to relax and enjoy our native wekas, wood pigeons, bellbirds, tuis and a myriad of other small birdlife. A 2 minute drive from the Goldsborough picnic area which is the starting point for 4 historic bushwalks (from 20 minutes to 4

Farmhouse/villa circa 1890, set in 1.5 acres of farmland at Whangateau. Sleeps 6, with full facilities.Bordered by a stream and a short walk to a safe beach. Handy to the Surf beaches of Omaha, and Pakiri.Near to Goat Island and Tauwharanui marine reserves.Mathesons Bay and Ti Point a stones throw away.Matakana, Farmers Market, movie theatre, Country Market, restaurants, and good fishing nearby.

Dog friendly cottage ( ask when enquiring) 2 bedroom pole cottage, king bedrooms each with own ensuite bathroom. Carpeted Bedrooms with curtains. Full length deck with access from bedrooms & living areas. Fully equipped kitchen & laundry. Double glazed through out plus the ambience & warmth of a woodburning fire if wanted. Relax on the full length raised deck with a wine, cook on the BBQ or

a.title: Pohutukawa cottage - Sanctuary in the Cove

p.span:
Sanctuary in the Cove is located in Coopers Beach, Doubtless Bay, Northland. Unfortunately we cannot accept bookings in Pohutukawa cottage for children.
Pohutukawa cottage is a cosy 2 queen bed bedroom home-away-from-home. This fully self-contained modern cottage is absolute waterfront and guests are able to launch the cottage kayaks straight from their front lawn.
The cottage has a heat

Matakana Coast Waterfront property
Modern fully self contained luxury unit, attached to owners home with separate entrance.
2 bedms with choice of king or single beds in each room.

Lovely, private and cosy studio unit just minutes to Picton shops and beach but located in pretty Essons Valley at the entrance to fabulous bush walking tracks. Tranquil setting with the sounds of bellbirds and tuis and opposite a babbling creek where weka and pukeko wander. For the adventuous and romantic there is an outdoor under the stars bath with continous hot water in your own private

MODERN, COMFORTABLE HOMELY HOLIDAY HOME WITH THE COMFORTS OF HOME. SKY TV MOVIES & SPORT, DVD PLAYER & CD PLAYER. WARM & COSY, BOARD GAMES FOR THE KIDS. EXCEPTIONAL MOUNTAIN VIEWS!! NEXT DOOR TO GOLF COURSE, WALKING DISTANCE FROM THE BEACH. CLOSE TO WINERY AND KAIKOURA TOWNSHIP 5 MINS BY CAR! DOUBLE GARAGE ENOUGH ROOM TO PARK THE BOAT OR JETSKI! GREAT FOR A GIRLS WEEKEND AWAY , A FAMILY WEEKEND

The spectacular Cardrona Valley is the ideal location for the ultimate ski holiday or for adventurous summer activities.
This property is situated only 3 minutes from the base of the Cardrona, Snowfarm and Snowpark Ski Resort access roads. Alternative ski areas of Coronet Peak, Remarkables and Treble Cone are all well within a comfortable 40 minute drive away.
This cosy home is luxuriously

A one bedroom ground floor self contained apartment. SKY TV and free unlimited Wifi. This has a separate access and is private and quiet. The decor is modern and offers everything you may need for a comfortable stay.
It is in a great location being close to Bethlehem shops, Bethlehem retirement villages and Mills Reef Winery. Just 8 min drive to Tauranga CBD and 15 min to main Mt Maunganui

a.title: 110 Lake Terrace Luxury Lake Front Apartments

div.a: Taupo Central Town, Central North Island

p.span:
5 Star Luxury lakeside three bedroom apartments. Relax on the terrace and enjoy spectacular views across Lake Taupo.
Peak Times include: Ironman, Lake Taupo Cycle Challenge weekend, Iron man weekend, Public Holiday long weekends, 24th December to 15th January, Concert in the Park weekend and all Marathon events.

This two bedroom cottage/bach in a lovely corner of town is adjacent to the salt water pool, picnic area, and children's playground. Motueka wharf and Motueka Marina close by. Large section with plenty of parking for cars and boat. Room for tents. Only a short drive to Motueka restaurants and shops. Cottage can sleep 5 people, but more are welcome if you bring your own tent and pay just $10 each

Gorgeous character cottage in the heart of Ballance St Village, tranquil private garden setting with sun soaked deck, two bedrooms plus sunroom. Short 1.5 km stroll over the river to town and only 30 seconds to Ballance St Village, where you will find Gisbornes best coffee, post shop, bus stop, butcher, pharmacy, dairy, hairdresser, liquor shop, takeaways etc. Fully equipped kitchen, free WIFI.

a.title: 54 Lake Terrace Luxury Lake Front Apartment Living

p.span:
THE CLOSEST LAKESIDE APARTMENT TO TAUPO TOWN CENTRE
The best location for the IronMan, Taupo Cycle Challenge Week, Iron Man and all Marathon events.
Luxury lake front two bedroom apartment. Just two minutes walk from restaurants, bars and shopping. Relax on the terrace and enjoy spectacular views across the Lake Taupo.

A modern conversion of an old 4 bay stable. Set in a working vineyard and olive grove. Full kitchen and full laundry. Close (5 minutes) to Blenheim, Wineries, Main Road. Easy to find. Perfect location for Garden Marlborough, Wine and Food Festival, St Clair Marathon or just a few days break to explore the regions many features. Pelorus and Queen Charlotte Sounds an easy 20 minutes away.

charming 1907 gatekeepers cottage to Melrose . Little Melrose is a completely refurbished cottage suitable for a single person or couple. 10 mins to central city. 5 mins to Hagly Park and Merivale shopping centre. Located in quiet street close to Papanui Road.

Luxury in the countryside and presented for total relaxation.
The cottage offers a fully equipped farmhouse kitchen, an indulgent bathroom with walk in shower and underfloor heating.
Tamerton farm is a peaceful rural retreat, only nine minutes from Wanganui, with 40 acres to discover, collect your own eggs and watch the cattle and sheep on the hillsides.
There is a log burner for

This RIVERSIDE LODGE offers attractive "rustic" accommodation on the banks of the Tongariro River, it is a fully serviced self-catered Lodge for up to 5 people. The guests have the best of both worlds - relax and enjoy the fishing action from a sunny upstairs deck overlooking the Major Jones Pool, or step into angling history and try your hand at catching a famous Tongariro rainbow trout,

A peaceful and private home away from home. From the goddess etched on the front door to the private back yard you will adore this gorgeous sunny cottage with its original art deco features and modern additions including continuous gas hot water, gas cooking and gas heating.
Main features include:
Master bedroom with new king size bed and hill views through a spectacular curved window

this property is a spacious fully furnished inner city town house comprising of internal access double garage. Separate laundry and toilet. spacious bathroom, three bedrooms, large lounge and separate dining. Five minute walk to Hagley Park and all the restaurants and attractions of the inner city.

Very warm and spacious holiday home,suitable for families or couples wanting a holiday away from the busy life. 3 bedrooms,plus a games room with pool table and table tennis,lots of outside space,for bikes and playing. 5min drive to Tongariro River, 45min drive to Whakapapa Ski fields. 10 mins drive to Lake Taupo. And so close to many more activities Turangi has to offer, Thermal hot pools,

Delightful sunny house 10 minutes walk from the centre of Waihi, on a quiet street. A four bedroom house with 2 kitchens, 2 bathrooms and 2 livings rooms, plus a self-contained cottage in garden which comprises kitchen/living/dining, double bedroom and bathroom. Lovely private sunny rear garden with BBQ facilities and spa pool.

a.title: Cove cottage - Sanctuary in the Cove

p.a: Cove cottage - Sanctuary in the Cove

p.span:
Sanctuary in the Cove - in Coopers Beach, Doubtless Bay, Northland - is a private paradise by the water. It has been described as "a seldom found jewel where once is never enough". Unfortunately we are unable to accept bookings for children.
Cove cottage is a luxury waterfront cottage with 2 queen bed bedrooms. This cottage is secluded under large Pohutukawa trees and is fully self-contained

Our cool comfortable apartment is right in the centre of all the action in Wellington. Close by to many shops and restaurants, just a block from Courtenay Place. Enjoy the pool & Gym facilities onsite.
Please note - we have a strict NO PARTY policy in this apartment.

Our relaxing apartment is right in the centre of all the action in Wellington. Close by to many shops and restaurants, just a block from Courtenay Place, you are moments from all the sites.
Please note - we have a strict NO PARTY policy in this apartment.

Stunning views from this cosy,comfortable well appointed 2 storey Alpine home. Poplar Cottage is located in a prime area of Queenstown. Only a 15-20minute walk into the town centre or you can take the scenic route around the edge of the lake and through the Queenstown Gardens and it is about a 30-40 minute walk. A fully equipped kitchen. All linen,firewood and cleaning products supplied.

a.title: Cloud 9 - Luxury Holiday Villa in Russell

p.span:
Cloud 9 is the perfect place to unwind in a magical oasis of beauty, privacy and tranquillity.
Book Cloud 9 as your own exclusive holiday villa which is located in beautiful natural bush surroundings above the historic Bay of Islands town of Russell, on the North Island of New Zealand. From the villa's privileged vantage point you can see and hear the crashing waves whilst, at night, Kiwis

Cardrona Mountain House is a large stylish self catering home across from the Famous Cardrona Hotel . Sleeps 10 with HOT SPA on the rivers edge, fireplace, pooltable and SKY TV adjacent to high country sheep stations and snow capped mountains An all year round destination with WINTER skiing and SUMMER hiking, biking, 4 wheel driving, horse trekking hunting ,fishing, golfing, wine and farm

This is a self contained 2 bedroom unit located beneath the main house. The unit has its own external access, is nice and private and includes 2 large bedrooms with Queen Sized Beds, Lounge, newly renovated Kitchenette*, Dining Area and ensuite off the Master Bedroom. The ensuite is a bit retro - being pink in colour. We usually recommend this flat for 2 people due to there being only 1 ensuite

6 Mt Charon is a 4 bedroom new home with all the mod cons for that home away from home feel. It is fully furnished and has all the neccesities for a young family.
This is a lovely, warm, modern and spacious house in a quiet culdersac. Located very close to the golf course, playground, skate park and just a short 10 -15 minute flat walk to the shops, cafes and Thermal Pools.
This home is

Lauren was voted 'events co-ordinator of the decade' by her wider family for finding The Billiards Room, a Queenstown holiday home with a difference.
And what a difference.
We're not just talking about the novelty of a full-sized billiards table. Or the breathtaking views of Lake Wakatipu and The Remarkables mountains. Or the fully-fenced lawn and cottage garden. Or the fun vehicle

Experience Awesomely Wicked; And make your vacation dreams into Awesomely Wicked memories.
Our funky modern apartment is in a quiet street and has breathtaking views of the mountains and Lake Wakatipu and town is only a 5 minute drive (or 20-25 minute walk) and the fantastic scenery continues all the way. Just simply arrive and start to enjoy this fully furnished pad.
The spacious

Quality Accommodation, King Bed, Private Spa Pool: Perfect holiday in the country yet close to Beaches and Cafs. Avoid Beach prices and make the most of your stay. You will be surprised how close we are to all the best holiday spots :) Modern self-contained 2 bedroom cottage with lots of space and privacy on 20 acres property: - As easy as a Motel - Private Spa Pool - As private as your own

* IMMACULATE EXECUTIVE APARTMENT * * SUPERB LOCATION * * TASTEFULLY FURNISHED * * SERVICED WEEKLY * * FREE WIRELESS INTERNET *
This beautiful three level apartment is warm and sunny, tastefully furnished and fully equipped with everything you need in a home away from home.
* Three bedrooms (queen bed in master bedroom on the main living level, one queen and one double bed in the

Trendy one bedroom unit in private semi rural location. Wake up to the sounds of the country while still close town. Private location with own deck area. Short drive to city centre and town beaches. Pharmacy, Superette, Bottle store and Thai, Chinese and Pizza restaurants just a short 10-15 minute walk to Balance Street Village.

Rated 5 Star for value by our guests on Tripadvisor, this private modern self contained unit, with off street parking, overlooks a spacious garden to what must arguably be the loveliest view of beautiful Acacia Bay. Sit up in bed for that morning cuppa and you will be spellbound by the wonderful panoramic view of Lake Taupo. In a quiet location close to the lake the unit has all the modern

A **BRAND NEW** fully self contained, architectually designed guest house, set up high on the flat bush height. A peaceful escape with spacious decks, private BBQ, digital TV, Internet, Meeting room, kitchen. With breathtaking views of East Auckland city. The property has off street parking and is only few minutes away to shopping center and restaurants. Only 30 minutes south of Auckland, make

New Listing! A 3 bedroom, 3 level home in Goldfield Heights with stunning views to the lake, Kelvin Heights and the Remarkables together with a private yard (unfenced) for the children to play, and sunny decks overlooking the lake. The main bedroom on its own level has ensuite and spa bath, on another level is the generous open kitchen, dining and lounge area, an upper level leads to two

Contemporary 4 bedroom, 3-level luxury villa overlooking town centre, with spectacular and uninterrupted views of the Lake and Mountains. Miele Nespresso coffee machine, fully serviced, wide balconies, complimentary wireless broadband access, cable TV, underfloor heating

5 bedroom house in landscaped garden of lawns, mature trees and roses. Located in historic treelined centre of Arrowtown 2 min walk from shops restaurants etc. The house comprises a rebuilt original cottage with a lodge style extension.The cottage fronts Buckingham St and the the main lodge is accessed from Bedford St. Only 20 Min from house to Coronet Skifield, and 40 min Cardrona and

Our rates are ALL INCLUSIVE - no add-ons for linen, WiFi & cleaning!
Welcome to Q-Crib - our fun and funky crib on the hill in Queenstown's premier location for visitors - mere minutes on foot into town and with jaw-dropping views over Lake Wakatipu.
Situated on lower Queenstown Hill - minutes from downtown and the lakefront - free WiFi - fireplace & electric heaters.
Fabulous lake and

5 Year old, modern 2 bedroom townhouse. Fully Alarmed with Electric Garage.
Relax and unwind in a quiet and restful location. Enjoy this air conditioned home, or sitting outside in the secure and tranquil courtyard.
Only minutes walking distance from the Trendy "The Colombo" mall (www.thecolombo.co.nz) and an abundance of upmarket restaurants, cafes and bars.
Master Bedroom has a

The Lakehouse Hawea is a haven for multiple families and small groups and can sleep up to 15 people. The house is super cosy with a huge logburner that cooks the house, a snug upstairs for the kids and a large living room with dining table for all. The living room adjoins a spacious kitchen with all the mod cons including a dishwasher.
The house is well laid out with a bunk room for 6 people,

Beautiful self catering cottage situated in a half acre garden filled with roses, peonies, lavenders, fruit trees, large vegetable garden and abundant bird life. The cottage has its own entrance and drive well separated from the house for privacy. Conveniently located 200m away from to the Great Taste Cycle Trial for both cycling and walking. For more information visit

a.title: Lemon Tree Cottage - fabulous family home with free WiFii

p.span:
This comfortable spacious 3 bedroom home makes a perfect base for family groups or friends travelling together.
The open plan living and dining area has lots of windows, flooding the cottage with sunlight from the North and West. The living room has a TV with freeview, DVD player and stereo, books, CDs, children's games and free wifi.
The kitchen is fully equipped with oven, hob, large

This new, luxury self-contained three bedroom home located in New Zealand's stunning Queenstown is the ideal destination for those that want to experience New Zealand's jewel of the south in style. Goldrush Glory offers breathtaking views overlooking Lake Wakatipu with the majestic Remarkable Mountain range as a backdrop. This stunning backdrop serves as an idyllic scene for rest and relaxation

There is no better way to enjoy Auckland and especially the North Shore than in your very own apartment situated in over half an acre of gardens and pool complex. Allegro is a one-of-a-kind apartment, single level with no stairs and a generous 50 square meters in size. The enviable location is the perfect base for taking full advantage of everything the North Shore has to offer. Just a short
